download-kubeconfig.description: Download your kubeconfig file for an environment. Kubeconfig can be downloaded using either an environment id or a combination of blueprint name and environment name.

blueprint-name.name: blueprint-name
blueprint-name.description: Blueprint name using which environment was launched

generate-config.description: Convert a JSON, YAML, or properties file of a springboot application to a Facets Application JSON env section

args.name: config-file
args.description: The JSON, YAML, or properties file to convert

access-token.name: access-token
access-token.description: Personal token generated for the user

push.description: Post new docker artifacts to the facets control plane

artifact-name.name: artifact-name
artifact-name.description: name of the artifact as mentioned in blueprint

registration-value.name: registration-value
registration-value.description: value for release stream or cluster id, based on mode of registration

description.name: description
description.description: description of the build if any

artifactory.name: artifactory
artifactory.description: artifactory where image will be pushed

git-ref.name: git-ref
git-ref.description: Git ref provided in CI Rule

refresh.description: Refresh your k8s credentials for an environment. Credentials can be refreshed using either an environment id or a combination of blueprint name and environment name.

environment-id.name: environment-id
environment-id.description: Environment id for credentials needs to be refreshed

environment-name.name: environment-name
environment-name.description: Environment Name for credentials needs to be refreshed

blueprint-name.name: blueprint-name
blueprint-name.description: Blueprint name using which environment was launched

register-by-env.description: Register already pushed images from external repository to facets control plane through environment name.

docker-image.name: docker-image
docker-image.description: docker image URL in the external registry

service.name: service
service.description: name of the CI integration for which the artifact needs to be registered

description.name: description
description.description: description of the build if any

registry.name: registry
registry.description: artifactory where image will be pushed

environment-name.name: environment-name
environment-name.description: environment name in which the artifact will be registered

blueprint-name.name: blueprint-name
blueprint-name.description: blueprint name in which given environment is present

environment-id.name: environment-id
environment-id.description: environment id in which the artifact will be registered

register-by-release-stream.description: Register already pushed images from external repository to facets control plane through release stream.

docker-image.name: docker-image
docker-image.description: docker image URL in the external registry

service.name: service
service.description: name of the CI integration for which the artifact needs to be registered

description.name: description
description.description: description of the build if any

registry.name: registry
registry.description: artifactory where image will be pushed

blueprint-name.name: blueprint-name
blueprint-name.description: blueprint name in which CI Integration will be created if not present already

service.name: service

registry.description: artifactory where image will be pushed

git-ref.description: git ref provided in CI Rule
